h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master
content: He'll also constantly end his three electric talismans out to distract you. Sometimes he'll shoot them straight out with a punch to add damage with a blast, but he can also hold them in front of him to create an even bigger blast, or send it around his back to slam down with his tail.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master'.
The content is as follows:
He'll also constantly end his three electric talismans out to distract you. Sometimes he'll shoot them straight out with a punch to add damage with a blast, but he can also hold them in front of him to create an even bigger blast, or send it around his back to slam down with his tail.
